entry.title: MYKOBO EURC Transitioning to Circle EURC
entry.content: 4th of July 2024. Vilnius, Lithuania.MYKOBO recently announced SEPA support for Euro deposits and withdrawals of the Circle EURC Stablecoin on the Stellar blockchain.Now, MYKOBO is excited to announce that the MYKOBO EURC Stablecoin issued on the Stellar blockchain will be transitioning to Circle EURC issued on the Stellar blockchain.MYKOBO will transition over 25K MYKOBO EURC asset holders to Circle EURC asset holders on the Stellar blockchain. MYKOBO EURC asset holders bridged to the Polkadot blockchain via the Pendulum Spacewalk bridge will also be transitioned to Circle EURC via the Spacewalk bridge.MYKOBO will expand itâ€™s services to provide support for Circle EURC across the Ethereum, Avalanche and Solana blockchains.The MYKOBO on/off ramps and cross border payment services will be expanded to all the blockchains on which Circle EURC is currently issued.Transitioning MYKOBO EURC to Circle EURC will allow MYKOBO to expand itâ€™s services in line with the Markets in Crypto Assets Regulation (MiCAR) for an Electronic Money TokenÂ (EMT).Circle has obtained the necessary licenses to make Circle EURC a MiCAR-compliant EMT.Over the coming months, MYKOBO will be working with all our customers and partner platforms to transition MYKOBO EURC asset holders to Circle EURC assetÂ holders.All current MYKOBO services will continue to operate as normal during the transition phase with no disruptions.For more information, please contact us at: support@mykobo.coMYKOBO provides a bridge connecting the European financial infrastructure to the blockchain using Euro Stablecoins that are pegged 1:1 with theÂ Euro.There are currently over 25K asset holders utilising the EURC Stablecoin on the Stellar blockchain through platforms such as Clickpesa, Beans, LOBSTR, Pendulum, xBull, LINK, Empowch and Honeycoin in addition to the MYKOBO apps on iOS andÂ Android.Circle has embraced a regulation-first approach in promoting the use of fully-reserved, fiat-backed digital currencies to empower businesses, promote financial inclusion, and drive fast, cost-effective global payments.Circle issues EURC with over â‚¬35M in circulation and USDC with over $32B in circulation as of July 4,Â 2024.

entry.title: SEPA Rails for Circleâ€™s EURC on Stellar
entry.content: MYKOBO is thrilled to announce support for Euro deposits and withdrawals of Circleâ€™s euro-backed stablecoin, EURC, on the Stellar blockchainWhat does this new service mean forÂ users?This means that European users with Stellar wallets will be able to make Euro deposits and withdrawals with Circleâ€™s EURC using the Single Euro Payments Area (SEPA)Â network.Where can users access thisÂ service?This exciting new service is now accessible via the LOBSTR wallet, renowned for its simplicity and security, and widely used on the Stellar blockchain.Click here to start a EUR deposit withÂ EURCClick here to start a EUR withdrawal withÂ EURCOr download the LOBSTR iOS or Android app today to start your EURCÂ journey.Why support Circleâ€™s EURC Stablecoin?MYKOBO believes in the potential of Circleâ€™s EURC as the leading Euro stablecoin for crypto capital markets, EURC is fully reserved so that itâ€™s always redeemable 1:1 forÂ Euro.Circleâ€™s EURC Stablecoin is currently issued on the Ethereum, Solana, Avalanche and Stellar blockchains.MYKOBO believes users will benefit from the trust, transparency, and security of Circle as the issuer of the USDC stablecoin with over $31B in circulation as of MarchÂ 2024.What does this mean for MYKOBOâ€™s EURC Stablecoin?MYKOBO will continue to provide full support for the MYKOBO EURC Stablecoin as the partnership with Circle continues expanding with the objective of building a trusted and interoperable Euro Stablecoin.What isÂ MYKOBO?MYKOBO provides a bridge connecting the European financial infrastructure to the blockchain using Euro Stablecoins that are pegged 1:1 with theÂ Euro.There are currently over 20K users utilizing the EURC Stablecoin on the Stellar blockchain through platforms such as Beans, LOBSTR, xBull, LINK, Empowch and Honeycoin in addition to the MYKOBO apps on iOS andÂ Android.What isÂ Stellar?Stellar is a blockchain where blockchain technology meets the real world by providing real world utility with solutions like the disbursement of aid or cheaper and faster cross border payments.What isÂ SEPA?The SEPA network allows users to send and receive cashless Euro bank payments via transfer and direct debit to anywhere in the European Union (EU), as well as a number of non-EU countries.

entry.title: AMA March Recap With CEO & Co-Founder: Seyi Akin-Olugbemi
entry.content: Q. Who isÂ Seyi?I am a hacker at heart. I enjoy building things and watching them come toÂ life.I studied Mathematics and Software Engineering and have 10 years of experience in the Fintech space working in payments, banking and microfinance.I worked for 16 years in technology starting with tech support and ending up as the IT Director for Technology and Infrastructure with the Richemont Group.Today, I run MYKOBO, the EURC Stablecoin issuer providing a bridge connecting European consumers and businesses to the blockchain usingÂ Stellar.Q. What does MYKOBOÂ mean?The â€œkoboâ€ is the smallest unit of the Nigerian currency, similar to the way the cent is the smallest unit of the USD or indeed the EUR currency.MYKOBO meansÂ MYCOIN.Q. What motivated you to start MYKOBO and a Euro stablecoin.MYKOBO was born one fateful day when Kwabena (CTO) and I got into a passionate discussion about sending money to Nigeria andÂ Ghana.We went deep, touching on topics like financial inclusion and blockchain technology and knew instantly we had to build what we were trying to articulate.Q. WhyÂ Stellar?Stellar is built at a protocol level to support the storage and movement of money i.eÂ â€œvalueâ€.This is exactly why we started MYKOBO so Stellar was a naturalÂ fit.Stellar also has a great community and support structure for companies building onÂ Stellar.Q. What isÂ EURC?The EURo Coin (EURC) is an asset-backed stablecoin pegged 1:1, issued by MYKOBO UAB and built onÂ Stellar.Q. What coins are supported onÂ MYKOBO?Currently, within the MYKOBO app, we support the holding of the following coins: EURC, USDC, XLM andÂ AQUA.Q. Can I hold coins from other networks?At present, all of the supported coins are connected to the Stellar blockchain network.It is not possible to hold other coins from other networks in theÂ app.Q. What Liquidity Pools are available?Pairs that are supported by MYKOBO in our app are:â€Šâ€”â€ŠXLM/EURCâ€Šâ€”â€ŠEURC/USDC (coming soon)â€Šâ€”â€ŠAQUA/EURC (comingÂ soon)Q. Does Circle manage the treasury?Circle do not manage our treasury. They are a partner that enables us to use their infrastructure forÂ USDC.MYKOBO is building the most active fiat-backed Euro stablecoin EURC onÂ Stellar.MYKOBO issues the EURC stablecoin pegged 1:1 with the Euro, providing a bridge connecting the European financial infrastructure to the blockchain usingÂ Stellar.For more information on MYKOBO and EURC visit the MYKOBOÂ website.

entry.title: Sending and Trading Money Just Got More Affordable
entry.content: Minimums Reduced to â‚¬1/1Â EURCWe are pleased to announce that we have reduced our minimum crypto to crypto send, as well as the minimum buy/sell value, to â‚¬1/1Â EURC.Previously, we had a â‚¬20/20 EURC minimum purchase and sell value (fiat-crypto-fiat), as well as a â‚¬20/20 EURC minimum sending value (crypto toÂ crypto).Now, we have made it easier for you to trade and transfer your crypto assets by reducing these minimum values to â‚¬1/1 EURC forÂ all.We understand that every Euro/EURC counts and we want to make sure that our platform is accessible to everyone, no matter the size of yourÂ trade.By lowering our minimum values, we hope to empower our customers and partners to participate in the crypto economy with greater ease and convenience.At MYKOBO we are committed to providing the best possible user experience and to continuously improving our platform.We believe that this reduction in minimum values will enhance the experience of all our users, and we encourage you to take advantage of these new features.MYKOBO issues the EURC stablecoin pegged 1:1 with the Euro, providing a bridge connecting the European financial infrastructure to the blockchain usingÂ Stellar.For more information on MYKOBO and EURC visit the MYKOBOÂ website.

entry.title: USDC Depeg and EURC
entry.content: An In-Depth Look at the Implications.We are pleased to inform you that as a euro Stablecoin issuer, our reserves are in a secure position compared to our competitors.We take pride in maintaining a robust reserve system that is regularly audited to ensure the safety and stability of our euro Stablecoin.Our approach to managing reserves involves strict adherence to regulatory requirements and industry best practices.We work with trusted financial institutions to hold our reserves, and we use multiple layers of security to protect against any potential threats.Compared to our competitors, we have taken extra measures to guarantee the security of our reserves.We believe that our approach to managing reserves provides our customers and partners with peace of mind and confidence in the long-term stability of our Euro Stablecoin.The official monthly EURC attestation Reports: https://attestations.mykobo.co/MYKOBO issues the EURC stablecoin pegged 1:1 with the Euro, providing a bridge connecting the European financial infrastructure to the blockchain usingÂ Stellar.For more information on MYKOBO and EURC visit the MYKOBOÂ website.

entry.title: Introducing EURC: The EURo Coin of the Future.
entry.content: The official launch of EURC, the secure, fast and reliable Euro Stablecoin.Introducing EURC!EURC is a fiat asset-backed Stablecoin pegged 1:1 with the Euro and issued on the Stellar blockchain.The Stellar Blockchain is built at a protocol level to support the storage and movement of money and with the electricity consumed per transaction at 0.17Â³Â¹ (Wh/txn), Stellar also supports sustainability.Click for more information about sustainability onÂ StellarEURC isÂ Ready907 - wallets have chosen to use the EURC Stablecoin2786 - EURCÂ payments65,654 - trades with EURC have been executed on the Stellar Decentralised Exchange.346,142 - overall traded volume ofÂ EURC150,559 - EURC circulating supplyClick for more information about the EURCÂ assetMarch MadnessTo celebrate the 1 year anniversary of UAB MYKOBO and the official launch of EURC there will be 0 transaction fees on all our services.This means 0 transaction fees on deposits, withdrawals and cross border payments throughout MarchÂ 2023.EURC isÂ LiquidEURC can be bought and sold on the following platformsBeansLobstrStellarTermStellarXCross Border Payments withÂ EURCCross-border payments with EURC are available in the following countries:KenyaTanzaniaRwandaand in the following countries in MarchÂ 2023:BrazilNigeriaArgentinaTurkeyMexicoUSFor more information about EURC visit the MYKOBOÂ website.UAB MYKOBO provides a bridge connecting the European financial infrastructure to the blockchain using Stellar and EURC, the EURo Coin pegged 1:1 with theÂ Euro.UAB MYKOBO is supervised by the Lithuanian Financial Crime Investigation Service as a Virtual Currency Wallet Operator and Virtual Currency Exchange Operator.

entry.title: MYKOBO 2022
entry.content: A recap of 2022 and anticipation forÂ 2023ğŸ„Compliments of the season to MYKOBO users, clients and partners! â˜ƒï¸BackgroundKwabena and Seyi met many years ago during a coder dojo where they were paired to do some light hacking. Years later they got into a passionate discussion about sending money to Nigeria and Ghana. They went deep, touching on topics like financial inclusion and blockchain technology.MYKOBO was born thatÂ day.Version 1Version 1 was painful! It was a Beta version built with Bitcoin (BTC) as the underlying blockchain to support virtual asset exchange. A lot of valuable lessons were learnt, nevertheless there were 97 users on VersionÂ 1.There was a need to select a different blockchain. There was also a need to identify a suitable location in Europe to setup operations; underpinned by the desire to operate within a regulatory framework.StellarThe Stellar blockchain was chosen for Version 2 because it is built at a protocol level to support the storage and movement of money. In addition, the Stellar Ecosystem Protocols (SEPs) make global inter-connectivity achievable at scale. Finally Stellar is just cheaper, faster andÂ greener!VilniusMYKOBO is based in the Rockit fintech hub in Vilnius, Lithuania. Vilnius was chosen because of clear blockchain regulations and a vibrant fintech community. Perfect!MYKOBO UAB is supervised by the Lithuanian Financial Crime Investigation Service and is also already engaging with the Central Bank of Lithuania for the upcoming MiCA regulations.Up andÂ runningThe aim of Version 2 was to build a solid infrastructure and ecosystem around the EURC stablecoin issued on the Stellar blockchain byÂ MYKOBO.The first purchase of EURC was in April 2022, a couple of months after the incorporation of MYKOBO. Here is what has been done since that first transaction.Consumer services are consumed from the MYKOBO app available on iOS andÂ Android.Business services are consumed via the MYKOBO API which supports:Service discovery (SEP-1)Non-interactive deposit and withdrawals (SEP-6)Authentication (SEP-10)KYC (SEP-12)Interactive deposits and withdrawals (SEP-24)Cross border payments to supported countries (SEP-31). Supported countries include US, Nigeria, Brazil, Kenya, Rwanda and Tanzania.3. EURC is available for deposit and withdrawal on these platforms:Beans AppLobstrStellarTermStellarX4. EURC is also available on the Aquarius network, the liquidity management layer forÂ Stellar.5. Over 400Â users6. Over 155K EUR overall tradedÂ volume7. Over 100K EURC in circulation8. Monthly attestation of EURCÂ reservesWhatâ€™s next inÂ 2023?Launch of the â€œSwap EURCâ€ feature allowing MYKOBO mobile app users to swap between any of the currencies supported within theÂ app.Introducing more cross border payment corridors such as Mexico, Argentina andÂ others.Launch of IBAN service for consumers and businesses.EURC will be available for deposit and withdrawal on more platforms in Q1 andÂ Q2.Launch of the EURC debitÂ card.Mobile phone paymentÂ options.More liquidity across the EURC-USDC and XLM-EURCÂ markets.Credit and debit card paymentÂ options.EURC cross chain functionality.Listing EURC on more exchanges and price tracking platforms.MYKOBO issues the EURC stablecoin pegged 1:1 with the Euro, providing a bridge connecting the European financial infrastructure to the blockchain usingÂ Stellar.For more information on MYKOBO and EURC visit the MYKOBOÂ website.

entry.title: Rome, Here we come!
entry.content: Weâ€™re ready for Rome and the #Stellar Meridian event. If youâ€™re in town and are interested in exploring the amazing opportunities that MYKOBO can offer you with our Euro Stablecoin payments, give us a shout and letâ€™s meet up! #Stellar #XLM #Rome #EURC #blockchain

entry.title: EURC on Beans!
entry.content: MYKOBO is proud and excited to announce a strategic partnership withÂ Beans.Beans allows you to earn a healthy yield on your crypto and fiat assets as well as make cross border payments at next to no costs. Head over to their website here; https://beansapp.com/ to find outÂ more.Beans was one of the recent winners of the Stellar Community Fund #10. In a resounding indication of approval, the Stellar community voted for the winners of theÂ fund.MYKOBO will be supporting the Euro on and off ramps for Beans using our EURC token. EURC effectively makes it easier for users of the Beansapp to deposit and withdraw funds for the platform in Euro. In addition Beansapp users will be able to apply for IBANâ€™s and other flexible payment options coming soon to the MYKOBO platform.This partnership represents the vision that both companies have of transparent, cheaper and faster cross border payments. Hence both companies are proudly built onÂ Stellar!Over the coming weeks both teams will be working on integrating MYKOBO services into Beansapp with a proposed launch date of early Q4Â 2022.#MYKOBO#Beansapp#EURC#StellarMYKOBO is a Euro anchor, issuing a native EURC token, connecting the European financial infrastructure to the blockchain using Stellar. https://www.mykobo.co/
